typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SALESREPSTG
source(output(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string,
		Current_Flag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENSIONSALES
source(output(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string,
		Current_Flag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(isNull(SalesRep_Key,0)) as MAXKEY from dbo.Dim_SalesRep',
	format: 'query') ~> MAXKEY
DIMENSIONSALES select(mapColumn(
		DIMSalesRep_Key = SalesRep_Key,
		DIMSalesRep_Number = SalesRep_Number,
		DIMSalesRep_Name = SalesRep_Name,
		DIMSalesRep_Department = SalesRep_Department,
		DIMCurrent_Flag = Current_Flag,
		DIMVerifyField = VerifyField
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SALESREPSTG, MAXKEY join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Select1 lookup(SALESREPSTG@SalesRep_Number == DIMSalesRep_Number,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupExistingRecords
LookupExistingRecords split(isNull(DIMSalesRep_Number),
	true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NEW, EXISTING2, EXISTING)
ConditionalSplit1@NEW derive(Current_Flag = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@EXISTING derive(NCurrent_Flag = 1,
		VerifiedField = 'New') ~> DerivedColumn2
ConditionalSplit1@EXISTING2 derive(uCurrent_Flag = 0) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 filter(DIMSalesRep_Key <= SalesRep_Key) ~> Filter1
Filter1 alterRow(updateIf(DIMSalesRep_Key <= SalesRep_Key)) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string,
		Current_Flag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Key,
		SalesRep_Number = DIMSalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name = DIMSalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Department = DIMSalesRep_Department,
		Current_Flag = DIMCurrent_Flag,
		VerifyField = DIMVerifyField
	)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string,
		Current_Flag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Key,
		SalesRep_Number = DIMSalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name = DIMSalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Department = DIMSalesRep_Department,
		Current_Flag = NCurrent_Flag,
		VerifyField
	)) ~> sink2
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string,
		Current_Flag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SalesRep_Key'],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.Dim_SalesRep ON;'],
	postSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.Dim_SalesRep OFF;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
